inlineContent.text: To enable enhanced understanding and more conversational interactions with Siri for your app, choose a domain and a schema that match your app’s functionality. By conforming your app intent, app entity, or your app enumeration to a schema, you ensure that Apple Intelligence understands your app’s actions and content. When you’ve identified the schema to use, leverage the

abstract.text: Make your app’s actions and content available to Siri and Apple Intelligence with assistant schemas.
